summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1139, for the improvement of Corliss Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from North Fortieth Street to North Forty-first Street, by grading the same and by constructing wooden curbs and gutters, under Ordinance No. 12906, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
